contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|penalty}} '''Penalty''' may refer to: {{tocright}} == Law == * [[Punishment]] * Penalty, [[sanctions (law)]] imposed by a court, judge or public administration * [[Tax]] == Sports == *[[Penalty (ice hockey)]] *[[Penalty (rugby)]] *[[Penalty (rugby union)]] *[[Penalty (American football)]] * [[Penalty (golf)]] *[[Penalty area]], part of an Association football field *[[Penalty box]], in ice hockey *[[Penalty kick]] in Association football *[[Penalty shootout]], a method of determining a winner in sports matches **[[Penalty shoot-out (association football)]], for Association football *[[Penalty shot (ice hockey)]] * [[Penalty shot]], a play used in several sports whereby a goal is attempted during stop-time *[[Penalty (Brazilian sports manufacturer)]] == Arts and entertainment == * [[The Penalty (film)|''The Penalty'' (film)]], a 1920 American crime film starring Lon Chaney * [[The Penalty (novel)|''The Penalty'' (novel)]], a 2006 sports novel for children by Mal Peet * [[Penalty Records]], a record label == Religion == * [[Penalty (Mormonism)]], an oath made during the original Nauvoo Endowment ceremony of the Latter Day Saint movement ==See also== * [[Penale]], surname {{disambiguation}} [[pt:Penalty]]
